title: Distributed Learning Environment Design for CSCL Infrastructure Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Conducted in a corporate environment providing digital devices for education, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: They can independently conduct DLE-based learning design for building CSCL (Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning) infrastructure within organizations
They develop collaborative learning scenarios applicable to real work environments by integrating various ICT tools

Learners can design three types of interactive content (quizzes, discussion boards, feedback surveys) using a mobile microlearning platform (e.g., corporate-exclusive app), establish an operational plan achieving at least 70% learner engagement and meeting four or more of five operational checklist items.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
